Texts.Eng: When you're starving, you have some options. A ^orange;Campfire^reset; cooks your meat. It's fast, but you'll need a ^green;bow^reset;, ^orange;Hunting Spear^reset;, ^orange;Bone Spear^reset; or ^orange;Hunting Rifle^reset; to obtain the meat. Get some and cook it. Then noms.
You could also take time to craft yourself a ^orange;Hoe^reset; and set to work making a viable farm. It will feed you far more in the long-term without risking death.
